title: Race for the Yankee Zephyr
creator_credit: Endeavour Productions, FGH Film Consortium and David Hemmings
brief_description: Set in New Zealand’s South Island, this film is about several men who learn of a wrecked DC-3 plane, that crashed in 1944 carrying $50,000,000 in gold. As they make plans to retrieve the loot, one man prepares to get it all for himself. Stars Ken Wahl, Lesley Ann Warren and Donald Pleasence.
